author: alexandertuna
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a BX 100 mixing scenario, for fair comparison with BX50 and BX200 scenarios. BX50 and BX200 already have (-3, 3) scenarios.

#### PR validation:

I produced ttbar samples with this mixing scenario and it seems to work as expected.

cc @slava77
title: Update Mixing.py to include 100_BX_25ns_m3p3
